text: Émilien Jacquelin (born 11 July 1995) is a French biathlete. He competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==Biathlon results== All results are sourced from the International Biathlon Union. ===Olympic Games=== 0 medal {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Event !style="width:70px;"|Individual !style="width:70px;"|Sprint !style="width:70px;"|Pursuit !style="width:70px;"| !style="width:70px;"|Relay !style="width:70px;"| |- | align=left | 2018 Pyeongchang | 77th | — | — | — | 5th | — |} ===World Championships=== 4 medals (2 gold, 2 bronze) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- " !style="width:200px;"|Event !style="width:70px;"|Individual !style="width:70px;"|Sprint !style="width:70px;"|Pursuit !style="width:70px;"|Mass start !style="width:70px;"|Relay !style="width:70px;"|Mixed relay !style="width:70px;"|Single mixed relay |- | align=left | 2019 Östersund | — | 24th | 29th | — | — | — | — |- | align=left | 2020 Antholz-Anterselva | — | 6th | style="background:gold;"| Gold | style="background:#cfaa88;"| Bronze | style="background:gold;"| Gold | — | style="background:#cfaa88;"| Bronze |} :*The single mixed relay was added as an event in 2019. ===World Cup=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" width="75%" |- class="hintergrundfarbe5" !
